# Knee-Diagnosis

Knee Diagnosis - PH845

## Requirements

[Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/) and [CWLTool](https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool#install)

## Configuration

Specify input dataset path in [Knee-Diagnosis-inputs.yml](Knee-Diagnosis-inputs.yml).

## Usage

Run: `cwltool Knee-Diagnosis.cwl Knee-Diagnosis-inputs.yml`
